resources.string:
"Hello! Welcome to the world of Flappy Pig. 
Use the white square on the right to control your pig. 
Don't hit the pipes! Get the highest score you can! And don't forget to collect those coins! 
The shop button opens the shop. Use coins to buy skins from the shop. 
The stats button opens up your statistics. 
The settings button opens the settings where you can change the background, volume and language. 
The help button opens these instructions. 
You can pause the game at any time using the pause button in the top right. 
Two powerups exist - 
			Magnet - Attract coins towards you at double speed. 
			Rush - Gain extreme speed and invincibility for some time. 
That's all for the instructions, Good Luck! Have Fun!"
The developer of Flappy Pig has launched a new game: Viper! \n\nIf you enjoy this game, check Viper out on Google Play by clicking the button below!
You don\'t have enough coins to buy the skin
